<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the vector. A node can &quot;point to&quot; itself to indicate that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// is the parent of a group, or point to another node to indicate</span></CodeLine>
